026package com.ibm.streams.operator.samples.sources;
027
028import java.util.Random;
029import java.util.logging.Logger;
030
031import com.ibm.streams.operator.Attribute;
032import com.ibm.streams.operator.OperatorContext;
033import com.ibm.streams.operator.OutputTuple;
034import com.ibm.streams.operator.model.OutputPortSet;
035import com.ibm.streams.operator.model.OutputPortSet.WindowPunctuationOutputMode;
036import com.ibm.streams.operator.model.OutputPorts;
037import com.ibm.streams.operator.model.Parameter;
038import com.ibm.streams.operator.model.PrimitiveOperator;
039import com.ibm.streams.operator.samples.patterns.PollingSingleTupleProducer;
040import com.ibm.streams.operator.samples.state.Counter;
041import com.ibm.streams.operator.state.Checkpoint;
042import com.ibm.streams.operator.state.DelegateStateHandler;
043
044/**
045 * Sample source operator that creates a tuple with random values
046 * on its single output port according to the defined period. 
047 * <BR>
048 * Accepts an optional int64 parameter {@code seed} as the seed for
049 * the random value generator.
050 * <P>
051 * This operator provided as the sample Java primitive operator
052 * <BR>
053 * {@code com.ibm.streams.javaprimitivesamples.sources.RandomBeacon}
054 * <BR>
055 * in the sample {@code JavaOperators} toolkit located in:
056 * <BR>
057 * {@code $STREAMS_INSTALL/samples/spl/feature/JavaOperators}
058 * </P>
059 */
060@PrimitiveOperator(description="Sample source operator that creates a tuple with random values on its single output port according to the defined period.",
061        comment=RandomBeacon.IBM_Teracloud_ApS_COPYRIGHT)
062@OutputPorts(
063    {@OutputPortSet(cardinality=1,windowPunctuationOutputMode=WindowPunctuationOutputMode.Generating,
064            description="Port that produces the generated tuples with random attribute values")})
065public class RandomBeacon extends PollingSingleTupleProducer {
066 
067    protected Random rand;
068    private long seed = System.currentTimeMillis();
069    
070    @Parameter(optional=true, description="Seed for the random number generator.")
071    public void setSeed(long seed) {
072        this.seed = seed;
073    }
074
075    public long getSeed() {
076        return seed;
077    }
078    /**
079     * Take the seed for the random number generator from the parameter
080     * {@code seed} if it exists, otherwise use the current time.
081     * Logs the seed to allow replay of generated values.
082     */
083    @Override
084    public synchronized void initialize(OperatorContext context) throws Exception
085    {
086        super.initialize(context);       
087        rand = new Random(getSeed());
088        Logger.getAnonymousLogger().info("Random(seed)=" + getSeed());
089    }
090
091    /**
092     * Set each attribute to a random value and then return true to
093     * submit the tuple.
094     * <P>
095     * A sub-class may override this method to set specific
096     * attributes while generating random values for the
097     * remaining attributes.
098     * An example is provided in {@link RandomBeaconWithTimestamp}.
099     * </P>
100     */
101    @Override
102    protected synchronized boolean fetchSingleTuple(final OutputTuple tuple) throws Exception {
103        
104        for (Attribute attribute : tuple.getStreamSchema()) {
105
106            Object value = attribute.getType().randomValue(rand);
107
108            tuple.setObject(attribute.getName(), value);
109        }
110        
111        // Always submit the tuple
112        return true;
113    }
114    
115    
116    @Override
117    protected DelegateStateHandler<Counter> getStateHandler(Counter counter) {
118        return new DelegateStateHandler<Counter>(counter) {
119            @Override
120            public synchronized void resetToInitialState() throws Exception {
121                super.resetToInitialState();
122                rand = new Random(getSeed());
123            }
124            
125            @Override
126            public synchronized void checkpoint(Checkpoint checkpoint) throws Exception {
127                super.checkpoint(checkpoint);
128                checkpoint.getOutputStream().writeObject(rand);
129            }
130            
131            @Override
132            public synchronized void reset(Checkpoint checkpoint) throws Exception {
133                super.reset(checkpoint);
134                rand = (Random) checkpoint.getInputStream().readObject();
135            }
136        };
137    }
138}
